statements: SELECT image_id, image_data FROM ImageData
SELECT * FROM ImageData WHERE image_id = 1
SELECT image_description, image_format FROM ImageData WHERE image_description LIKE '%beautiful%'
SELECT image_id, image_description, image_format FROM ImageData ORDER BY image_id DESC
SELECT image_id, image_format, image_description FROM ImageData WHERE image_format = 'JPEG'
SELECT image_id, image_data, image_description, image_format FROM ImageData WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ImageData WHERE image_format = 'JPEG' ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_description FROM ImageData WHERE image_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5 AND image_format = 'PNG' ORDER BY image_description;
SELECT * FROM ImageData WHERE image_description LIKE '%beach%' OR image_description LIKE '%mountain%';
SELECT DISTINCT image_format FROM ImageData WHERE image_id > 2 ORDER BY image_format ASC;

SELECT description, image_data FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT video_id, duration FROM videos WHERE video_id = 3;

SELECT image_id, description FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(duration) AS average_duration FROM videos;
SELECT video_id, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT image_id, description FROM images WHERE description LIKE '%beautiful%';
SELECT * FROM Images;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM Images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Videos ORDER BY video_name DESC;
SELECT video_id, video_name FROM Videos WHERE video_name LIKE 'fun%';
SELECT tag_name FROM ImageTags WHERE tag_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM Images ORDER BY image_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM Images WHERE image_id = 2;
SELECT image_name, tag_name FROM Images JOIN ImageTags ON Images.image_id = ImageTags.tag_id;
SELECT AVG(video_id), COUNT(*) FROM Videos GROUP BY video_name;
SELECT DISTINCT image_name, video_name FROM Images, Videos WHERE Images.image_id = Videos.video_id;

SELECT video_name FROM VideoData WHERE fps > 30;

SELECT image_name, image_data FROM images WHERE image_name LIKE 'A%';
